Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31963532]Hepatitis C virus (HCV):inhibition of viral replication in Huh7.5.1 cells(IC50=3.35±1.1 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: BmKDfsin3 is revealed to enter into cells. Using an upstream MyD88 dimerization inhibitor ST2345 or kinase IRAK-1/4 inhibitor I, the inhibition of p38 activation represses HCV replication in vitro.

Literature.Title: Inhibitory Activity of a Scorpion Defensin BmKDfsin3 against Hepatitis C Virus.
Literature.Author: Cheng Y, Sun F, Li S, Gao M, Wang L, Sarhan M, Abdel-Rahman MA, Li W, Kwok HF, Wu Y, Cao Z.
